name: aps-mcp
description: MCP server for Autodesk Platform Services: get tokens, list hubs, and call APS APIs.

tools.name: aps_login
tools.description: Start 3-legged OAuth login (opens browser). Gives user-context access to APS.

tools.name: aps_logout
tools.description: Clear 3-legged session. Falls back to 2-legged (app) token.

tools.name: aps_get_token
tools.description: Verify APS credentials and obtain a 2-legged access token.

tools.name: aps_dm_request
tools.description: Raw Data Management API call (project/v1, data/v1). Full JSON:API response. Power-user tool.

tools.name: aps_list_hubs
tools.description: List ACC/BIM 360 hubs (accounts) — compact summary with name, id, region.

tools.name: aps_list_projects
tools.description: List projects in a hub — compact summary with name, id, platform.

tools.name: aps_get_top_folders
tools.description: Get root folders of a project (Project Files, Plans, etc.).

tools.name: aps_get_folder_contents
tools.description: Summarised folder listing with file types, sizes, version info. ~95% smaller than raw API. Supports extension filtering.

tools.name: aps_get_item_details
tools.description: Get summarised metadata for a single file/item: name, size, version, dates.

tools.name: aps_get_folder_tree
tools.description: Recursive folder-tree structure with file counts per folder.

tools.name: aps_docs
tools.description: APS Data Management quick-reference: ID formats, workflows, API paths, error troubleshooting.

tools.name: aps_issues_request
tools.description: Raw ACC Issues API call (construction/issues/v1). Full JSON response. Power-user tool.

tools.name: aps_issues_get_types
tools.description: Get issue categories and types (subtypes) for a project — compact summary with id, title, code.

tools.name: aps_issues_list
tools.description: List/search issues with filtering by status, assignee, type, date, text. Compact summary per issue.

tools.name: aps_issues_get
tools.description: Get detailed info for a single issue: title, status, assignee, dates, custom attributes, comments count.

tools.name: aps_issues_create
tools.description: Create a new issue. Requires title, issueSubtypeId, status. Supports all optional fields.

tools.name: aps_issues_update
tools.description: Update an existing issue. Only send the fields you want to change.

tools.name: aps_issues_get_comments
tools.description: Get all comments for an issue — compact list with body, author, date.

tools.name: aps_issues_create_comment
tools.description: Add a comment to an issue.

tools.name: aps_issues_docs
tools.description: ACC Issues API quick-reference: project ID format, statuses, workflows, filters, error troubleshooting.

tools.name: aps_submittals_request
tools.description: Raw ACC Submittals API call. Full JSON response. Power-user tool for any submittals endpoint.

tools.name: aps_list_submittal_items
tools.description: List submittal items — compact summary with title, number, status, priority, revision. Supports filtering.

tools.name: aps_get_submittal_item
tools.description: Get full details for a single submittal item by ID.

tools.name: aps_list_submittal_packages
tools.description: List submittal packages — compact summary with title, identifier, spec section.

tools.name: aps_list_submittal_specs
tools.description: List spec sections for submittals — identifier (e.g. 033100), title, dates.

tools.name: aps_get_submittal_item_attachments
tools.description: Get attachments for a submittal item — file names, URNs, revision numbers.

tools.name: aps_submittals_docs
tools.description: ACC Submittals API quick-reference: endpoints, statuses, custom numbering, workflow, key concepts.

aps_client_id.title: APS Client ID
aps_client_id.description: Your Autodesk Platform Services app Client ID (from aps.autodesk.com)

aps_scope.title: APS OAuth scope(s)
aps_scope.description: Space-separated scopes (e.g. data:read or data:read data:write). Default: data:read

aps_callback_port.title: 3LO callback port
aps_callback_port.description: Localhost port for the 3-legged OAuth callback. Default: 8910
